rows.label: qev027003_MSG0001
rows.name: Heeeey... I know you, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0002
rows.name:
Oh, right! You're the BLADE I asked to go hunt down
the mystery sniper, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0003
rows.name:
Not to brag, but but but I remembered who you were,
didn't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0004
rows.name:
So what's the news? Did you beat up whoever shot
me, perhaps? Beat him up good?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0005
rows.name: ...Hmm? Hmmmmmmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0006
rows.name:
That's not the face of someone about to give good
news, is it? I've got a nose for these things.
...Or eyes, I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0007
rows.name:
Either way, I find it hard to believe you'd let them slip
away, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0008
rows.name:
And if you did, then what are you doing here?
You've got to go after them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0009
rows.name:
If [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] knew where they were headed, I'm sure [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ]'d be
doing exactly that, wouldn't [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0010
rows.name:
When you're out of clues, you go back to where it all
started, right? That's rule one of investigations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well, if we're back at square one, we need to start
thinking about how else to to to track them down,
don't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0012
rows.name:
So don't just stand there waiting for us, okay?
Come up with some ideas already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_JNK0010
rows.name: Act Methodically

rows.label: qev027003_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest that you start by asking around.

rows.label: qev027003_JNK0020
rows.name: Act Unexpectedly

rows.label: qev027003_SEL0021
rows.name: Propose a plan so crazy it just might work!

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0013
rows.name:
Without clues, I suppose we have no choice but to
gather new data, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0014
rows.name: Boring, though. And time-consuming, even?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0015
rows.name:
But it's better to spend the time on something you know
will work than to waste time trying out wild ideas, no?
Sometimes there just aren't any shortcuts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0016
rows.name:
So I guess you need to hit the mean city streets and
and and start asking around, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0017
rows.name:
We're talking about a Ganglion here, and one carrying
a sizable weapon. Not exactly subtle, no?
Someone must have seen something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0018
rows.name:
The one thing we know for sure is that none of us are
really safe until we catch whoever's responsible, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0019
rows.name: Let's hope that happens sooner rather than later, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0020
rows.name:
I very very much agree—this is a matter of Ma-non
survival. Now good luck to you, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0021
rows.name: We'll be cheering you on from from here, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0022
rows.name:
A crazy plan? You mean a long shot gamble, right?
...Er, no sniping pun intended.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0023
rows.name:
Sounds interesting, perhaps?
What do you have in mind for all this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0024
rows.name: I'm curious to hear more as well. Er, if that's okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0025
rows.name:
...Hmm. ...Right right right.
...Oh, that's brilliant, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0026
rows.name:
So...we re-create the exact conditions under which the
last attack happened to try to lure them out, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0027
rows.name:
When you're out of clues, go back to where it all
started, right? It's perfect![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0028
rows.name: Er, sorry? Would one of you explain what's going on?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0029
rows.name:
We leave you standing in a conspicuous spot on
top of the ship, yes? Then we just wait for them to
shoot at you again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0030
rows.name: WHAAAAT?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0031
rows.name:
Once they do, we trace the shot back to its source
and BOOM! We have them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0032
rows.name: It's genius, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0033
rows.name: Hold on! I have to to to get SHOT again?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0034
rows.name: I could really die this time, no?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0035
rows.name:
Don't sell yourself short, Heradot.
You're very sturdy by Ma-non standards, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0036
rows.name:
I mean, look at you—you got shot and you're
practically fine, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0037
rows.name:
Relax, okay? There's nothing to worry about.
All you need is a little more self-confidence, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0038
rows.name:
Heh. You really think I'm that tough? Gosh...
Well, I suppose I could take one for the team.
Er, another one, I mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0039
rows.name: Then it's settled. Operation Get Heradot Shot is go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0040
rows.name:
Let's do this before you have a chance to reconsider.
Get on that rooftop and make a big target of yourself!
Maybe even jump around a bit?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0041
rows.name:
Right! ...Though I have this sneaking suspicion that I'm
being tricked. Or maybe just used? Right? Used?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0042
rows.name:
If I survive this, I've got to work on saying no, yes?
Er, I mean...no, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0043
rows.name: No introspecting, okay? Up up up! Rooftop! Go go go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0044
rows.name: Ah, fine! Give me a minute, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0045
rows.name: I'm in position, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0046
rows.name: Good good good! Now stand by to get blasted, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0047
rows.name: HERADOT! You okay, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0048
rows.name:
Urrrgh...? Er, I mean, of course. I have crazy reflexes
by Ma-non standards, remember?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0049
rows.name: And I got a good look at it this time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0050
rows.name:
The shot definitely came from the northwest.
That means they've got to be hiding in Bedrock Hold,
doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0051
rows.name:
Amazing work! I knew you could do it, yes?
We'll pin them down this time for sure![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027003_MSG0052
rows.name:
What are you waiting around for? They're near
Bedrock Hold, right? Go go go! Hurry hurry hurry![ST:wait ]
